content:
Version 1.3.4

New features of v1.3:

  • Option to change number of minutes before sunset
  • Added rooster sound
  • Make alarm repeat every day

    • Bug fixes:

  • Fixed bug which closed egg by itself
  • Fixed bug which made alarm go off only once
  • Fixed bug which made alarm go off immediately after reboot
  • v1.3.4: Fixed bug which made alarm go off after reboot when alarm should not go off at all
